title: What does it take to get s plus on lucian?
body:
So I have had some great Lucian games lately, going usually upwards of ten kills, high cs and 1 or 2 deaths (if that) plus a load of assists, and have only got at highest an s minus, even going 21 2 4 with 306 cs, what does it take?? 
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/131753364/200718829?tab=overview
this match wasn't nearly one of my best, but still all i got for this was an A.

replies.body:
I play {{champion:236}} and I got him 2 tokens for **level 7**. What i did to earn them i just played with a premade {{champion:53}} or a {{champion:201}} and i had to do **pentakill** or **quadrakill**. That's my advice to get {{champion:236}} **to level 7**. Just do a **pentakill** or a **quadrakill**!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I think thats a lot harder than said{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

> [{quoted}](name=ArcticBlaze,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=o2hoYB4z,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2018-02-18T20:44:48.229+0000)
>
> I think thats a lot harder than said{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

WHY.
IT'S BEEN DEAD FOR A FUCKING YEAR.
WHY WOULD YOU NECRO THIS.
Hahaha It's a bit of an old thread here, however I've managed to achieve it a  few times since then myself as well
man i get A and i did 42/4/7 200 creeps at 25

Due to the fact that it isn't a set score, we can't really answer accurately.

**Riot hasn't released a list of the factors that contribute to a high grade**, but I would suggest working on objective assists, and possibly warding to bump up your grade that extra notch ♥

Either that, our pull out the same scores you have been while playing him in an off-meta position (mid, top).

> [**It’s based on the champion and role that you just played in a game. So, for example, we look at Annie mid differently to Annie support.** We take a series of performance metrics and compare how you do to all other players in your region in your champion / position combination. It is percentile driven - **so earning a high score means you performed in the top x% of players on that champ in that position**. The grade itself governs the point gains.
](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/features/champion-mastery)
dont play lucian and you can get an S+ in life

There must be really good LUCIAN players on the server, you need to have ur stuff even higher it's based off other players who played Lucian on the server , either LUCIAN is op and easy to get super fed with or high tier players play him a lot and nobody tries him out anymore
